articles.title: Kim Jong Un Plants Trees with KPA Pilots
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Plants Trees with KPA Pilots
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Monday visited Unit 447 of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and planted trees with fighter pilots of the unit.
					 He was greeted on the spot by commanding officers of the unit.
					
					 The Supreme Commander had a talk with fighter pilots.
					
					  He said that today is a significant tree-planting day when President Kim Il Sung raised the torch of tree-planting movement, adding that he came to plant trees with fighter pilots of the unit, which produced the heroic, self-sacrificing and self-blasting spirit of the brave red hawks of Songun Korea.
					
					 To conduct a vigorous forest restoration campaign is an important political undertaking for implementing the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who had worked heart and soul all their life to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery, and it is the most patriotic work for the country's development and prosperity of all generations to come, he said, urging the KPA to take the lead in the work to create and conserve forests.
					
					 The unit, which is associated with great leadership feats of the Generalissimos and has fully displayed the suicidal-attack spirit in carrying out the combat orders given by the Party, should become a model of the whole army in afforestation, too, he said.
					
					 Then Kim Jong Un, together with fighter pilots, planted ginkgo and other species of trees he personally provided after choosing places fit for them.
					
					 While planting the trees with a shovel in his hands, he taught in detail such matters arising in planting trees to meet the scientific and technological requirement.
					
					  On the same day, he went round a monument to the merits of 14 stalwart fighters, who displayed the suicidal-attack spirit, at the unit. This monument was built, under the deep care of the Supreme Commander, to convey the heroic feats performed by the 14 fighter pilots in the operation to ensure the successful launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-2.
					
					 The monument was built well in such a way as to show a symbolic meaning, he said, adding that the suicidal-attack spirit of the fighter pilots who defied death to carry out the order of the Party serves as a guide of the ideological work in the People's Army.
					
					 The unit displayed its matchless valor in the battles with the U.S. imperialist aggressors not only in the last Fatherland Liberation War but also in the postwar period and created a-match-for-a-hundred heroic spirit, self-sacrificing and self-blasting spirit, that can never be found in army of any other country, he said, adding: It is high pride of our Party and country to have this unit.
					
					 The Supreme Commander showed his deepest trust in the unit, which produced 14 stalwart fighters with suicidal-attack spirit, including DPRK Hero Jong Chol Ju, saying he hopes that it would become the first guards unit of the air force in the 21st century and thus another stanza of "Song of Pride of Guards Unit" would be created to tell about its combat merits.
					
					 He had a photo session with the fighter pilots of the unit in front of the monument.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol and Son Chol Ju.

articles.title: Greetings to Bulgarian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Bulgarian Prime Minister
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju on Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Boyko Borisov, prime minister of the Republic of Bulgaria, on its national day.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the economic development and prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation would get stronger in the common interests of the people of the two countries.
					
					 On the same day DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to his Bulgarian counterpart Daniel Mitov.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Outgoing Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Outgoing Lao Ambassador 
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell visit to him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Will Face Ruin for Their War Drumbeats: CPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces Will Face Ruin for Their War Drumbeats: CPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- An extremely grave situation has now been created on the Korean Peninsula due to reckless Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces. 
					 The south Korean puppet group, in collusion with the U.S. scheming to stifle the DPRK by force, is pushing the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 The Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Tuesday released the following statement under the prevailing grave situation:
					
					 First. As the south Korean puppet forces have come out as a shock brigade in executing the U.S. scenario to ignite a war against the DPRK, all the service personnel and people of the DPRK will resolutely punish the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the puppet war maniacs through merciless and toughest countermeasures.
					
					 All strike means for ground, sea, underwater, air and cyber operations of the Korean People's Army which never makes empty words have now been placed on alert, aiming at targets.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have joined the U.S. in the military drills, dreaming a wild dream to stifle the DPRK by taking advantage of the U.S. power. This is, indeed, as foolish an act as digging up their own abyss of ruin together with the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 As they have come out as servants of the U.S. keen on igniting a war against the DPRK, they can never escape the punishment by the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK determined to resolutely wipe out the provocateurs and aggressors, which will just lead them to their final ruin.
					
					 The DPRK, as it had already warned, will deal the harshest baptism of fire beyond imagination at the confrontation maniacs attempting to invade its inviolable territory, and conclude the great war for national reunification with final victory.
					
					 Second. Now that the puppet warmongers are making an open challenge by kicking off the war drills against the north, together with the U.S., the opportunity of the north-south dialogue and improvement of relations have already passed and there will only be a final stand-off by force.
					
					 Advancing an important proposal to write the new history of the inter-Korean relations this year, the DPRK urged the south Korean authorities to stop all war moves including reckless military drills they stage with outside forces on an annual basis.
					
					 But the puppet group kicked off the provocative drills simulating a nuclear war against the north together with its U.S. master, blatantly challenging the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet group brings dark clouds of a war to hang over Korea in collusion with the U.S. imperialist aggressors. Yet, it makes a spate of absurd sophism that the war drills are one thing and the inter-Korean relations are another thing.
					
					 The group who has already set fire to an ammunition dump is trumpeting about "dialogue", pretending ignorance of it, but no one will be taken in by. And more cemented will be the DPRK's will to mercilessly stamp out confrontational maniacs who dare level guns at their compatriots.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces will be made to keenly realize what miserable consequences caused by war they will face as they just let a golden opportunity offered for the north-south dialogue and improvement of the relations go by. 
					
					  Third. The whole Korean nation and the peace-loving people all over the world are required to resolutely check and frustrate the anti-DPRK nuclear war drills by the U.S. and south Korean puppet group that harass the peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity. 
					
					 The prevailing situation vividly shows once again that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces are the very ones who disturb the peace and stability on the peninsula and screw up the tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 While aggression and war are the U.S. mode of existence, unconditional submission and pursuance to the U.S. are the second nature the south Korean puppet forces have acquired for existence.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are traitors who got so shameless as to hand over the prerogative of the supreme command of the army to the U.S. and hurled young people as bullet shields for the U.S., while crying out for "blood alliance". 
					
					 It is self-evident that as long as the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are allowed to continue anti-DPRK war drills, the Korean nation can neither lead a peaceful life nor evade the nuclear holocaust.
					
					 The final victory is in store for the army and people of the DPRK all out for the just cause while bitter defeat and final ruin await the U.S. and south Korean puppet group.
					
					 The aggressors and provocateurs will keenly experience the bitterest consequences of their vicious nuclear war drills against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK and Tortures in Various Parts of World Slammed
articles.content:
U.S. "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK and Tortures in Various Parts of World Slammed 
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean Jurists Committee on Tuesday issued a white paper laying bare the shameless and vicious anti-DPRK racket kicked up by the U.S., the worst human rights abuser in the world, under the pretext of "defending human rights", and its tortures in different parts of the world and illegal sanctions.
					 The white paper dealt with the criminal purpose and injustice of the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 The criminal purposes of the racket are to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK, create an atmosphere of international pressure on it and, furthermore, invent a pretext for invading it and thus stamp out its ideology and bring down its social system.
					
					 The U.S., just as it internationalized the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, has sought to find a "legitimate pretext" for interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK and bringing down its social system by pulling it up over its "human rights issue" in international arena.
					
					 It let its henchmen fake up false documents on the human rights performance in the DPRK and massively spread them. At the same time, it took to different countries human scum who deserted from the DPRK after committing indelible crimes and let them make false testimonies in a bid to mislead world public opinion.
					
					 On this basis the U.S. and its followers railroaded a "human rights resolution" against the DPRK through the 69th Session of the UN General Assembly, more openly revealing their sinister attempt to bring down its social system.
					
					  In July, 2004 the U.S. cooked up the "North Korean Human Rights Act" and set up even the "envoy for the human rights issue in north Korea" in the U.S. Department of State. It is busy with the "human rights" smear campaign against the DPRK, interference in its internal affairs, by squandering lots of money every year.
					
					 The injustice of the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK is manifested in abusing the UN for encroaching upon the sovereignty of independent states, violating people's human rights and carrying out its strategy for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. is using the UN Human Rights Council whose mission and duty are to contribute to settling the human rights issue worldwide as a major lever for interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK and bringing down its social system.
					
					 The U.S. staged the farce of making "human rights abuses" in the DPRK an established fact and putting international pressure on it, abusing the basic mission and duty of the UN General Assembly. 
					
					 If the UN makes profound confusing of right and wrong and blindly follows the U.S., pressurized by its high-handed and arbitrary practices, justice and truth will be trampled down and the global peace and security and the noble ideal of mankind to enjoy genuine human rights will never come true.
					
					 The white paper brought to light the truth about the barbarous tortures practiced by the U.S. in different parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. chose torture as its policy not only in its mainland but abroad and put prisoners to tortures not only by mediaeval methods but by all other methods and means to which modern scientific and technological means are applied.
					
					 Prisoners in the U.S. who account for 25 percent of the total number of prisoners in the world, are suffering serious pain and many people were killed mercilessly due to the barbarous tortures committed at the connivance of its government and under its patronage.
					
					 The U.S. harsh tortures are being more shamelessly practiced at its overseas secret prisons.
					
					 Inhuman and mediaeval tortures were perpetrated systematically and in a premeditated manner at the overseas secret prisons with the approval of the U.S. president and under the patronage of the U.S. government.
					
					 The south Korean KBS reported that the U.S. set up secret prisons in 9 countries including Afghanistan and Iraq and has operated them on a permanent basis. It has 47 torture facilities across the world and spent nearly 81 million U.S. dollars for developing cruel torture technology.
					
					 The mass killings committed by the U.S. against Koreans during the Korean war go to clearly prove that torture is the U.S. inveterate bad habit and disease.
					
					 According to data, UK and 20 other European countries offered secret prisons and interrogation bases to the CIA and allowed the passage of prisoners through their countries and their stay there, a proof of active cooperation with the U.S. in its human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. and those European countries involved in its tortures should stop pulling up other countries over their "human rights issues". They should apologize for their crimes before the world and be punished by law for them. 
					
					 The white paper lashed out at the U.S. for slapping base political and economic sanctions against the DPRK and anti-imperialist independent countries in different parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. banned credit loan and foreign aid to the DPRK and individuals' investment in it, froze real estate in the U.S. in case their heirs and bereaved family members are DPRK citizens and barred them from receiving even life insurance.
					
					 The U.S. is now slapping "new sanctions" against the DPRK through the presidential executive order by groundlessly linking the cyber attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment of the U.S. with the DPRK.
					
					 By taking issue with the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and the DPRK's launch of satellite for peaceful purposes, the U.S. prodded the UN Security Council into escalating the "sanctions" against it and is working hard to turn them into "permanent international sanctions".
					
					 The U.S. harsh economic sanctions against sovereign states are being slapped not only against the DPRK but against other countries.
					
					 Typical of them are the anti-Cuban sanctions and blockade being imposed since the 1960s, sanctions against Iran enforced since late in the 1970s, economic sanctions against Sudan which started early in the 2000s and anti-Russian sanctions getting serious recently.
					
					 The U.S. is running the whole gamut of gimmicks to justify its human rights abuses under the mask of "human rights champion".
					
					 All the U.S. criminal scenarios to bring down the social system of the DPRK will go totally bankrupt in face of the latter's powerful army, the white paper said.
					
					 It called upon countries and nations loving justice and truth and aspiring after genuine human rights to join a dynamic trend of the times to expose and condemn the U.S. barbarous human rights abuses and check and frustrate them.

articles.title: Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Visit Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Pegaebong Bivouac
articles.content:
Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Visit Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Pegaebong Bivouac
						
 Samjiyon, March 3 (KCNA) -- Senior officials in charge of administrative affairs across the country visited the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site and the Pegaebong Bivouac on Tuesday as part of their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 At the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, they were briefed before the monument to field guidance of President Kim Il Sung and looked round various places of the site.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the place by leading the first group for the tour of the revolutionary battle sites in June, Juche 45 (1956) and gave teachings to find out and successfully spruce up revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu to make contribution to the education in revolutionary traditions.
					
					 The members of the tour group looked round the revolutionary historical buildings and relics preserved to their former glory.
					
					 They went to the Pegaebong Bivouac which the President dropped in at on the way of advancing into the country with main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army during the offensive in the Musan area.
					
					 They held a question-and-answer study contest on the same day. They conducted various political activities among people in Samjiyon County and went round the venue of the ice sculpture festival.

articles.title: DPRK Order Awarded to Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Order Awarded to Lao Ambassador 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Order of DPRK Friendship 2nd Class was awarded to Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday. 
					 He extended support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people and made a contribution to developing the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Laos. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and officials concerned and staff members of the Lao embassy.

articles.title: Amnokgang Sports Team Noted for Ssirum Aces
articles.content:
Amnokgang Sports Team Noted for Ssirum Aces 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Amnokgang Sports Team is well-known at home for having produced a number of aces not only in the marathon and weightlifting events but in Ssirum (Korean wrestling) event.  
					 The team took part in Ssium event of the DPRK Championships in Juche 102 (2013) for the first time.
					
					 In the championships the team won a gold medal in the 80kg category and made fine records in the 75kg, 85kg and catch-weight categories.
					
					 In 2014, it took more medals in different categories of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games, finished first in the team event of the Youth Championships by grabbing gold medals in five categories and won six medals, including gold medals in 57kg and above 105kg categories, in the DPRK Championships.
					
					 Its player scaling in at 75kg took the first place in the catch-weight category of the DPRK Championships by defeating his rivals weighing over 100kg.
					
					 Song Jun Ho, vice director of the team, told KCNA that the team would produce more aces by putting training on a scientific basis.

articles.title: Polyploidization Applied to Cultivating Mushroom
articles.content:
Polyploidization Applied to Cultivating Mushroom 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Agricultural College of Kim Il Sung University succeeded in applying polyploidization to cultivating mushroom.
					 The technology based on polyploidization makes it possible to breed high-yield varieties of mushroom, which are two times higher than the previous ones in productivity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Straining Situation on Korean Peninsula
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Tension is rapidly escalating on the Korean Peninsula, the biggest hotspot in the world, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The National Defence Commission of the DPRK issued a statement on Feb. 4 in which it reflected the strong will of the army and people of the DPRK to resolutely cope with the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a nuclear war. This evoked a lively response and commanded warm support and sympathy from the progressive people.
					
					 This was a stern warning of the DPRK to the U.S. going reckless.
					
					 Much upset by this, some heavyweights of the Obama regime trumpeted about dialogue in a bid to pass the buck for the escalating tension to others. 
					
					 While talking about dialogue, the U.S. was so foolish as to put up a precondition to seek the collapse of the Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 While oft-repeating dialogue, the U.S. staged a drill for operating extended deterrence means for the purpose of getting familiar with political and military counteraction procedures to cope with the north's "nuclear and WMDs and ballistic missile threats" in mid-February in collusion with south Korean puppet forces. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists made desperate efforts to sour the climate for mending the inter-Korean ties in January and went busy with joint military rehearsal together with the south Korean warmongers in February. This plunged the Korean peninsula into the worst tension. 
					
					 This fact goes to clearly prove that the U.S. is the chief culprit preventing the inter-Korean relations from being mended and escalating the situation on the Korean peninsula and the enemy of peace.
					
					 Citing facts to show the trend of the world situation, the article stresses that peace and stability can never be achieved apart from the struggle against the U.S. imperialists keen on dominating the world.

articles.title: U.S. Has Lost Position of "Superpower": Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Has Lost Position of "Superpower": Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Frank Rose, U.S. assistant secretary of State for Disarmament, talked rubbish in a speech made at a meeting of U.S. atomic scientists that the U.S. beefing up of its forces in the Asia-Pacific region and building of missile shield are not to contain China and Russia but to cope with "threats" from Iran and north Korea. He jabbered that the U.S. has neither capability nor intention to intercept huge modern missiles of China and Russia.
					 Commenting on his remarks, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday ridicules that the U.S. is reading the faces of others now though it behaved high- handedly in dealing with the international affairs ten years ago.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is now obliged to make clumsy explanations for the introduction of its aggression forces into the Asia-Pacific region and has to sound out the attitude of big powers on the projected deployment of THAAD in south Korea.  This is the poor position of the U.S. 
					
					 This fact proves that the U.S. has completely lost its position of "superpower".
					
					 The 21st century is the one for the U.S. decline.
					
					 The U.S. dollar-dominated world financial and monetary system is collapsing while its nuclear stick is being broken though Washington brandished it as it pleased. 
					
					 The U.S. is bound to meet the same fate as that of Roman Empire.
					
					 However, the U.S. remains cunning and mean, while being pushed out of the position of "superpower".
					
					 It is no more than a trick to deceive the countries around the DPRK that the U.S. is trumpeting about its "threat".
					
					 The U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy would not help regain its position of "superpower," the commentary notes, adding: This empire of evils is bound to fall.

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Turning Itself into War State
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Japan of Turning Itself into War State
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Japanese government submitted "Bill on National Security" to the Liberal Democratic Party and the New Komeito Party, ruling coalition parties. It calls for the expansion of the overseas military activities of the "Self-Defence Forces" (SDF). The keynote of the bill is to give the government the mandate for dispatching the SDF overseas without resolution of the UNSC, enact a permanent law for it and revise the previous "law on situation in surround areas" for dramatically increasing objects and scope of the SDF's assistance.
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to prove that a major breakthrough is being made in the implementation of the policy of war shaped by the Japanese reactionaries who have worked hard to find the way of stepping up their militarist moves for overseas expansion for years.
					
					 Japan, as a defeated nation, made much fuss about instituting the "Pacifist Constitution" and adopting the "no-war resolution" in face of the world community's resentment and protest against its past crimes in the post-war period. But this was not its real intention.
					
					 Japan, however, has gradually paved the way for the militarist overseas expansion, backed by the U.S. and pursuant to its strategy for dominating Asia, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Not content with this, Japan is scheming to eliminate all elements obstructive to the SDF's overseas military actions.
					
					 Japan is rapidly turning itself into a militarist state for overseas aggression from the "pacifist state" under the present regime.
					
					 This is a very serious development that threatens peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 No one can vouch that the same tragedy as what happened by Japan during World War II will not repeat itself.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should immediately roll back the policy of war, bearing in mind that their military overseas aggression will lead to their self-destruction.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Chief Executive's Sycophancy toward Outsiders
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules S. Korean Chief Executive's Sycophancy toward Outsiders
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye, chief executive of south Korea, in her "address on March 1", again  revealed her true colors as a wicked traitor.
					 She blustered she "would bring about economic growth equivalent to that in 30 years to come through three years of economic innovation", talking about "a new era for cooperation with Japan" in the 21st century and "partnership with it for the 50 years to come" and the like. She dared pull up the DPRK over its nukes, crying out for its "opening" and "change."
					
					 In a nutshell, she let loose a flurry of rhetoric in a bid to conceal her group's domestic and foreign policy failures. In the final analysis, she only brought to light her sinister intention to intensify her dictatorial rule, further tighten the nexus with the U.S. and Japan and continue the confrontation with the north.
					
					 Park, no more than a servant of both the U.S. and Japan, was so ridiculous as to make an "address on March 1" when the Korean nation demonstrated its spirit of independence. But it became a laughing stock of the world.
					
					 The uprising, which started with a massive anti-Japanese demonstration launched in Pyongyang on March 1, 1919, was a nation-wide patriotic one against Japan to take back the lost country and sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					 The Koreans, who had bitterly experienced sorrow as stateless people under the fascist and repressive colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, joined the uprising in various parts of the country and powerfully demonstrated the indomitable will of the Korean nation to achieve independence and patriotic spirit.
					
					 Park in her "address" talked about the spirit of March 1 movement, pretending ignorance of large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war games kicked off by her group together with its U.S. master to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean nation. This is, indeed, the height of impudence and shamelessness.
					
					 The contents of her "address" were nothing but a tirade peppered with ego-driven words, arbitrary purposes, sycophancy toward outsiders and intention to escalate confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 Now that the south Korean people are suffering hard living due to the crippled economy, she called for bringing about economic growth equivalent to that in 30 years to come through three years of economic innovation so that those who will "mark the centenary of national liberation" might benefit from it. What she uttered only brought to light her ulterior purpose to mislead public opinion and stick to her unpopular economic policy and "yusin" dictatorship as it was nothing but an artifice to veil her incompetence with the phraseology of "30 years to come." 
					
					 While keeping mum about the evermore undisguised moves of Japan to grab Tok islets and being forgetful of the crimes the Japanese imperialists perpetrated against the Korean nation, Park talked the above-said rubbish and called for writing a new history together with the latter. This is mockery of the March 1 Uprising and a base pro-Japanese act of helping Japan launch reinvasion.
					
					 As regards the inter-Korean relations, in particular, Park again pulled up the DPRK over its nukes symbolic of the independence and dignity of the nation, which serve as a treasured sword for peace and reunification guaranteeing happiness and prosperity of all Koreans for all ages, while crying out for its "opening" and "change" like a psychopath. This revealed her ulterior intention to stifle the DPRK and realize at any cost her wild ambition for "escalated confrontation of social systems" by taking advantage of the U.S. nuclear racket against it.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group talks much about dialogue and cooperation in public but gets frantic with nuclear war drills targeting the north behind the scene, an indication that it does not have even an iota of intention to have dialogue and cooperation with the north and mend relations with it but pursues only confrontation and war in actuality.
					
					 What should undergo a change is nothing but the confrontation policy of the south Korean conservative group.
					
					 Park's "address on March 1" brought into bolder relief the true colors of her regime as the unpopular one seeking only sycophancy toward outsiders and confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 She should properly understand the mindset of angry public and the wrath of all Koreans. She had better behave with reason, though belatedly, if she doesn't want to follow in the footsteps of the preceding rulers who met a miserable end while pursuing fascism, treachery, confrontation and war.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Forcible Closing of Progressive Paper Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Forcible Closing of Progressive Paper Assailed
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Organizations of various circles in south Korea condemned the regime for forcibly closing Jaju Minbo, a progressive paper.
					 The Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy of south Korea in its statement on Feb. 27 held that Jaju Minbo had conducted open and legitimate activities for independence, democracy and reunification for the past 15 years and taken the lead in implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The decision to ban the paper is part of the Park Geun Hye regime's reckless suppression of political parties, organizations and activists calling for progress and reunification under the pretence of public security by kicking up a whirlwind for "eliminating followers of the north," the statement said, adding:
					
					 The harsher suppression gets, the stronger the resistance of justice grows and the second and third Jaju Minbo will appear.
					
					 The Pastorate Council for Realizing Justice and Peace of south Korea also released a statement on Feb. 26.
					
					 It warned that the arrogant and ego-driven Park's regime is bound to face a stern punishment.
					
					 It urged the regime to immediately stop its suppression of fair-minded intellectuals, religionists, politicians and media persons.

articles.title: AI Discloses Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea
articles.content:
AI Discloses Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean branch of Amnesty International held a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 25 at which it issued a report on the human rights abuses in south Korea, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 The report said that south Korea's overall human rights performance made a retreat for the past two years under the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 It noted that Ri Sok Gi, ex-lawmaker from the former Unified Progressive Party, and several others were put in custody on charges of violation of the "Security Law" and the party was forcibly disbanded by an unreasonable decision made by the "Constitutional Court", a proof of the invocation of the fascist law at will.
					
					 The present regime is threatening and detaining progressive forces by invoking the SL, it charged, deploring the serious violation of freedom of expression, assembly and demonstration in south Korea. 
					
					 The report referred to the facts that activities of trade unions are suppressed in south Korea, human rights of immigrant workers are abused under serious working conditions little short of forced labour and human rights situation remains serious within the puppet army as its soldiers are meeting death due to harsh acts.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Actions Staged across S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Actions Staged across S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Anti-"government" actions were staged across south Korea on Feb. 25.
					 The South Kyongsang Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, the Joint Council of Civic and Public Organizations in South Kyongsang Province and other civic and public organizations in the province held a press conference at the provincial office building.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference termed two years of the Park Geun Hye regime two years of deterioration of people's living.
					
					 The preparatory committee for democratic Kwangju action also held a press conference in Kwangju at which it denounced the present regime for rigging the election with the Intelligence Service, the Cyber Command, etc. involved and failing to fulfill its commitment to people's welfare.
					
					 At the press conference of the preparatory committee of the Kangwon Provincial Movement Headquarters for Defense of Democracy involving more than 10 civic, public and religious organizations and political parties in south Korean Kangwon Province speakers said the present south Korean society is like a sinking boat.
					
					 The preparatory committee for South Jolla Provincial People's Movement Headquarters for Defense of Democracy made public a statement on the situation outside the provincial office.
					
					 Hundreds of copies of leaflets were scattered in different parts of Seoul including the vicinity of Chongwadae on the same day.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Covering up Japan's Past History
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Covering up Japan's Past History 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Wild remarks of the U.S. assistant secretary of State for political affairs came under fire by an editorial of the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on March 2.
					 He in a keynote speech at a seminar held in Washington on Feb. 27 made reckless remarks siding with Japan as regards the issue of the settlement of its past crimes, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 What he uttered was not a simple gaffe.
					
					 The U.S. was so nervous about plugging Japan into south Korea-U.S.-Japan triangular military alliance that it was in the poor position to forget where it should stand.
					
					 It is to blame in no small measure for Japan's denial of its past history of aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Closing Progressive Paper
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Closing Progressive Paper
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on March 1 accused the puppet regime of shutting down a progressive internet paper.
					 Park Chung-Hee, the "yusin" dictator, forcibly shut down Minjok Ilbo in 1961 and his daughter Park Geun Hye closed Jaju Minbo, an editorial said, and went on:
					
					 Under the present regime progressive political parties and organizations have become targets of forcible dissolution and suppression under the pretence of public security and progressive and democratic media are closed.
					
					 Minjok Ilbo will wage an undaunted struggle against the undemocratic action.

articles.title: Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime Demanded by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime Demanded by Koreans in U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. staged demonstrations in different parts of the U.S. demanding the resignation of the south Korean puppet regime.
					 Koreans in Los Angeles on Feb. 26 denounced Park Geun Hye for seizing the power illegally.
					
					 They urged Park to step down at once as she caused Sewol disaster, disbanded the Unified Progressive Party and shut down a progressive newspaper.
					
					 A joint statement in the joint name of Koreans residing in Los Angeles, New York, Washington, Boston, Chicago, Philadelphia, Seattle and Dallas was read out.
					
					 Saying that for the past 70 years the people have struggled for democracy in protest against the dictatorial regime, the statement said democracy won through the April 19 uprising, the May 18 resistance and the June resistance has been violated and the dictatorial power is blocking the advance of history.
					
					 It called for waging new pro-democracy movement involving all regions, strata, generations and progressive organizations to win genuine democracy, seek the resignation of the regime and achieve the nation's peaceful reunification.
					
					 Similar demonstrations also took place in New York and Washington on Feb. 28.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Syrian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Syrian Figure 
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus of Syria, made public a statement on February 13 to honor the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 February 16 is the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean people and the world progressives highly praise him as the great leader and the sun of the 21st century as he devoted his whole life to bringing happiness to the people, ensuring justice and defending world peace and stability. 
					
					 He achieved the single-minded unity of the whole society and weathered all ordeals and difficulties with trust in the people and comrades and benevolent politics and all-embracing politics. 
					
					 His whole life was the one of his devotion to the work for rosy future of the country and its people. 
					
					 It was the goal and worth of his life to work for the building of a rich and prosperous country and people's happiness. 
					
					 His noble image will remain in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives as he devoted himself to the country and its people. 
					
					 Now the DPRK is vigorously advancing to achieve national reunification and build a thriving nation and winning world-startling victories under the wise guidance of HE Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Indian Papers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Indian Papers
						
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- Indian papers dedicated articles to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The New Delhi Times in an article titled "Wishes of leader Kim Jong Il" on Feb. 12 noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il once said his greatest wish is to make the Korean people well-off.
					
					 He devotedly worked to translate it into a reality.
					
					 He visited anywhere people work and live.
					
					 To build a thriving socialist nation where everything goes well backed by strong national power and its people are well-off -- this was the goal set by him to realize his wish.
					
					 He found his pleasure in the louder happy laughter of the people.
					
					 Another paper in an article titled "Into core of single-minded unity" noted:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, regarding the single-minded unity as the mainstay of the revolution, firmly consolidated the single-minded unity of the Korean society with the army as its core under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Thanks to him, the warmest and truest relations of love and belief were made between the supreme commander and his soldiers, and the Korean People's Army was prepared as a pillar and main force of the Korean society for carrying out the socialist cause.
					
					 No force on earth can break the unity.

articles.title: KFA Introduces Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
articles.content:
KFA Introduces Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
 Pyongyang, March 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted on its homepage a photo-accompanied article "Flowers in praise of great men" on February 22 introducing the immortal flowers Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Mototeru Kamo, a Japanese horticulturist, was greatly attracted by the personality of HE Kim Jong Il as the great man and named a flower he newly bred as Kimjongilia and presented it to Kim Jong Il in Juche 77 (1988). 
					
					 Now there are many greenhouses cultivating Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias in different countries of the world. 
					
					 The Nordic Kimjongilia Association, American Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Association, Japanese Kimjongilia Fanciers Society and other organizations were formed. 
					
					 The Society for Disseminating and Supporting Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia involving famous personages is an international organization which has branches in China, Japan, Indonesia, U.S. and other countries to widely disseminate the immortal flowers. 
					
					 Kimjongilia was formally registered as a new breed of Begonia by the International Society for Horticultural Science and it has received several top prizes in the international flower exhibitions and world horticultural expos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un planta arboles con pilotos de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un planta arboles con pilotos de EPC
						
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea visito el dia 2 la unidad 447 de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea, condecorada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup y planto arboles con los pilotos de la unidad.
					El Mariscal fue acogido en el terreno por los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo charlo con los pilotos.
					
					Dijo que hoy es el Dia de Reforestacion en que el Presidente Kim Il Sung encendio la primera antorcha de la campana de plantacion de arbol y anadio que vino para plantar arboles con los pilotos de la unidad natal del heroismo y del espiritu de sacrificio y suicida de los halcones rojos de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Menciono que la restauracion forestal es una importante labor politica para materializar el legado de los grandes lideres quienes se empenaron por la reforestacion y la creacion de  areas verdes del pais y es el maximo trabajo patriotico por el desarrollo de la patria y la prosperidad de las generaciones venideras y subrayo que el Ejercito Popular debe ponerse tambien a la cabeza en la repoblacion y la proteccion forestales.
					
					Debe ser el modelo de todo el ejercito, tambien en la plantacion de arboles, esta unidad donde estan impregnadas las hazanas de los grandes lideres realizadas en la direccion sobre el ejercito y se manifesto altamente el espiritu de bomba y suicida en el cumplimiento de la orden de combate del Partido, asevero.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un escogio los sitios para plantar Picea koyamai, Metasequeoia glyptostroboides, gingko y otros arboles preparados por si mismo y los planto con los pilotos de la unidad.
					
					Plantando en personal arboles, indico los problemas cientificos y tecnicos  que se presentan en plantarlos segun la demanda cientifica y tecnica tales como cavadura de hoyos, regadura, apisonamiento de tierra, etc.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal recorrio el monumento a meritos de 14 soldados suicidas, levantado en la unidad.
					
					El Comandante Supremo habia concedido gran solicitud de levantar ese monumento para transmitir las proezas de ellos quienes participaron en la operacion a fin de asegurar el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite artificial de Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-2".
					
					El Mariscal dijo que el monumento fue erguido bien con significado simbolico y agrego que el espiritu heroico de 14 pilotos que salieron al combate a muerte para cumplir la orden del Partido es el poste de senal de la labor ideologica del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Esta unidad dio origen al espiritu de "uno contra ciento" y de sacrificio y suicida sin precedentes, al mostrar valentia en el combate contra los agresores norteamericanos durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y  en el periodo de posguerra, dijo y agrego que contar con tal unidad deviene el infinito orgullo de  nuestro partido y patria.
					
					Exhorto a esta unidad, que formo a 14 soldados de bombas y suicidas inclusive el heroe Jong Chol Ju, a ser primera unidad guardia de las fuerzas aereas del siglo 21 y dio la maxima confianza de que al obtener el honroso titulo de la unidad guardia contribuya a crear una estrofa mas en la "Cancion de orgullo de unidades guardias" con las proezas de combate.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un se fotografio junto con los pilotos de la unidad ante el monumento a meritos de 14 soldados de bombas y suicidas.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, O Il Jong, Han Kwang Sang, Ri Pyong Chol y Son Chol Ju.

articles.title: CRPP condena ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- Se torna extremadamente grave la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana debido a los imprudentes ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle de Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos.
					En su nota publicada el dia 3 en relacion con que en contubernio con EE.UU., deseoso de atropellar a la RPDC por via militar, la banda titere surcoreana lleva la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de guerra, el Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria declaro como sigue:
					
					1. Todo el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC castigaran sin piedad con las contramedidas superintransigentes a los agresores norteamericanos y los belicistas titeres, ya que estos se ofrecieron como brigada de choque de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC obedeciendo a EE.UU.
					
					Todos los medios de ataque terrestres, navales, aereos y ciberneticos del Ejercito Popular de Corea, que no dice palabras hueras, se mantienen ahora en el estado de alerta apuntando los blancos asignados.
					
					La incorporacion en los ejercicios militares de los titeres surcoreanos, que se hacen la ilusion con aplastar a la RPDC con la ayuda de EE.UU., es un acto suicida que busca la autodestruccion junto con los agresores norteamericanos.
					
					Ya que ellos se ofrecieron como lacayos de la campana belica de EE.UU., no podran evadir el castigo de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias de la RPDC, que estan decididas a exterminar a los provocadores y agresores con el fuego implacable, y sufriran asi el arruinamiento definitivo.
					
					Como ya hemos declarado, concluiremos con victoria final la guerra de reunificacion de la patria, al dar un golpe de poder inimaginable a los maniacos de enfrentamiento que se atreven a agredir nuestro sagrado territorio patrio.
					
					2. Dado que los belicistas surcoreanos desafian frontalmente realizando con EE.UU. los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC, ya se perdio la oportunidad de dialogo y mejoramiento de relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y habra solo la batalla final mediante el enfrentamiento de las fuerzas.
					
					Tras presentar las propuestas importantes de escribir nuevamente en este ano la historia de relaciones N-S, hemos exigido reiteradamente a las autoridades surcoreanas el cese de todas las maniobras belicas, inclusive los imprudentes ejercicios militares con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					Sin embargo, la banda titere surcoreana desafio a esas iniciativas al librar con mayor intensidad con su amo gringo los provocativos ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Ahora la camarilla titere surcoreana trae el nubarron de guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea en contubernio con los agresores norteamericanos y por otra parte, dice absurdamente que los ejercicios belicos no tienen nada que ver con las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Nadie hara caso del "dialogo" preconizado por los que realizan ejercicios de guerra.
					
					Por el contrario, se hara mas fuerte la voluntad de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de castigar despiadadamente a los fanaticos de confrontacion que se atrevieron a apuntar los fusiles a los connacionales.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos probaran cuan tragica es la consecuencia de haberse buscado los desastres de guerra rechazando la preciosa oportunidad de dialogo y mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					3. Toda la nacion coreana y otros pueblos amantes de la paz del mundo deberan frenar y frustrar rotundamente los entrenamientos de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda surcoreana que perturban la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					La situacion de hoy demuestra otra vez que el autor, que destruye la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y fomenta la tension en la region del Nordeste Asiatico, es precisamente los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus lacayos surcoreanos.
					
					Si la agresion y la guerra devienen el modo de existencia de EE.UU. gangsteril, la obediencia incondicional a este imperio es el modo de subsistencia de los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Es la banda titere surcoreana la que empuja a los jovenes inocentes como carne de canon y describe como "alianza consanguinea" las relaciones con EE.UU., sin sentirse verguenza de haber entregado en bandeja a este imperio la autoridad de mando militar.
					
					La realidad demuestra que mientras prosigan las maniobras de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana, la nacion coreana no podra vivir nunca en paz ni evitar la catastrofe de guerra nuclear.
					
					La victoria final la alcanzaran nuestro ejercito y pueblo que se levantaron para cumplir la justa causa y el imperio estadounidense y los traidores surcoreanos sufriran la derrota amarga y el arruinamiento final.
					
					Los agresores y provocadores experimentaran con escalofrios cuan tragico sera el resultado de sus maniobras de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Comite de Juristas de Corea publica carta blanca de condena a campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Comite de Juristas de Corea publica carta blanca de condena a campana anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Comite de Juristas de Corea publico el dia 3 una carta blanca para revelar la campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que lanza EE.UU. bajo el cartel de "defensa de DDHH", las torturas y sancion ilegal que aplica en todas partes del mundo ese peor violador de DDHH.
					El documento revela el proposito criminal y lo injusto de la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					Su objetivo criminal reside en manchar la imagen de la digna RPDC, formar el ambiente de presion internacional sobre ella y eliminar su idea y regimen al preparar la justificacion de invasion armada, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. quiso preparar el pretexto "legal" de intervencion en asuntos internos y derrocamiento de regimen cuestionando en la sociedad internacional el "problema de DDHH" de Corea, repitiendo el antecedente de haber internacionalizado el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Por conducto de sus lacayos, invento el documento fraudulento que tergiversa la situacion de DDHH de la RPDC y lo propago ampliamente.
					
					Por otra parte, engano la opinion publica internacional haciendo a la chusma, que huyo de la RPDC tras cometer crimenes imperdonables, viajar a varios paises y divulgar sus testimonios no apegados a la realidad.
					
					A base de ello, EE.UU. y sus satelites aprobaron por la fuerza la "resolucion de DDHH" anti-RPDC en el 69o periodo de sesiones de la Asamblea General de la ONU, exponiendo asi su intencion hostil de derrumbar el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. invento en julio de 2004 el "proyecto de ley de DDHH del Norte de Corea", fabrico en el Departamento de Estado el cargo de "enviado especial encargado de DDHH del Norte de Corea" y refuerza la demagogia de "DDHH" anti-RPDC malversando cada ano muchos fondos.
					
					La injusticia de esa campana se expresa en que el imperio abusa de la autoridad de la ONU para violar la soberania de los Estados soberanos y los derechos humanos de sus pueblos y para realizar su dominio mundial.
					
					EE.UU. usa el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que asume la mision de contribuir a la solucion del problema de DDHH en escala mundial, como medio de intervencion y derrocamiento del regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					Malempleando la mision principal de la Asamblea General de la ONU, trata de aprovecharla como espacio de presion internacional sobre la RPDC haciendo hecho consumado la "violacion de DDHH" en esta.
					
					Si la ONU invierte la verdad rendida ante el despotismo de EE.UU. y se deja llevar por este, desapareceran la justicia y la verdad y no se realizara nunca el noble ideal de la humanidad sobre la paz y seguridad del mundo y los verdaderos derechos humanos.
					
					En el interior y el exterior del pais, EE.UU. toma las torturas como una de sus politicas y las aplica con metodos medievales y medios cientifico-tecnicos modernos.
					
					Debido a las torturas que se cometen bajo la tolerancia del gobierno, sufren tremendos dolores los presos norteamericanos, que representan un cuarto de la poblacion encarcelada del mundo, y mueren tragicamente numerosas personas.
					
					Las brutales torturas se aplican con mas cinismo en las carceles secretas instaladas por EE.UU. en el extranjero. 
					
					Segun la cadena surcoreana KBS, EE.UU. instalo y opero permanentemente las carceles secretas en Afganistan, Irak y otros 7 paises.
					
					Acondiciono 47 instalaciones de tormento a lo largo del mundo y malgasto 81 millones de dolares para desarrollar las tecnicas de tortura.
					
					La masacre cometida por EE.UU. contra el pueblo coreano durante la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953) comprueba claramente que la tortura es un vicio cronico de ese pais.
					
					Segun los datos disponibles, 21 paises europeos, inclusive Gran Bretana, ofrecieron a la CIA las carceles secretas y las bases de interrogatorio y permitieron el paso y la permanencia de los presos en los respectivos territorios nacionales. 
					
					Al igual que EE.UU., los paises europeos complices de las torturas deben pedir disculpas a todo el mundo por su crimen y someterse al castigo legal, en vez de cuestionar el "problema de DDHH" de alguien.
					
					EE.UU. mantiene la sucia sancion politica y economica contra los paises antiimperialistas e independientes, inclusive la RPDC.
					
					Prohibe el prestamo a credito y la ayuda exterior a la RPDC y hasta la inversion de nivel civil en ella.
					
					En el caso de que algun heredero o su familiar sea ciudadano de la RPDC, congela sus bienes inmuebles en EE.UU. y les priva del derecho a cobrar la prima del seguro de vida.
					
					  Ultimamente, EE.UU. atribuye injustamente a la RPDC el hacking contra Sony Pictures e impone a ella la "sancion adicional" mediante la orden administrativa del presidente.
					
					So pretexto del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la RPDC, EE.UU. recrudecio gradualmente la "sancion" intentando hacerla perenne e internacional por conducto del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					La RPDC no es la unica victima de la brutal sancion de EE.UU.
					
					A citar ejemplos, el bloqueo anticubano que comenzo en la decada de 1960, la sancion que sufre Iran desde finales de la decada de 1970, la sancion economica sobre Sudan iniciada a principios de la decada de 2000 y las medidas de sancion contra Rusia que se tornan graves en estos tiempos.
					
					Disfrazado cinicamente de "defensor de DDHH", EE.UU. hace todo lo posible para justificar sus crimenes de violacion de DDHH.
					
					Todas sus maniobras, que persiguen el objetivo criminal de derrocar el regimen norcoreano, seran fracasadas totalmente ante las poderosas fuerzas armadas de la RPDC.
					
					Los paises y las naciones, que aman la justicia y la verdad y aspiran a los verdaderos derechos humanos, deben sumarse a la corriente de la epoca para condenar los tremendos actos de violacion de DDHH de EE.UU. y frustrarlos.

articles.title: Cuadros de administracion continuan recorrido por la zona del monte Paektu
articles.content:
Cuadros de administracion continuan recorrido por la zona del monte Paektu
						
Samjiyon, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- La caravana de recorrido de los cuadros de administracion de todo el pais por los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu visito el dia 3 el lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Rimyongsu y el campamento secreto del pico Pegae.
					En el primer destino, los visitantes estuvieron en varios puntos tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					En junio del 45 (1956) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito ahi al frente del  primer grupo de recorrido por los campos de batalla revolucionaria.
					
					En esa ocasion, dio instrucciones de descubrir todos los campos de batalla revolucionaria de la zona del monte Paektu y acondicionarlos excelentemente de modo que contribuyan a la educacion en la tradicion revolucionaria.
					
					Los caravanistas vieron los edificios de interes historico-revolucionario, que se conservan en estado original, y los datos.
					
					Visitaron luego el campamento secreto del pico Pegae por donde paso el Presidente Kim Il Sung en el trayecto a la patria dirigiendo el grueso del Ejercito Revolucionario Popular de Corea en los dias de operacion de avance a la zona de Musan.
					
					Ese dia, los cuadros realizaron el concurso de preguntas y respuestas y los trabajos politicos entre las masas del distrito Samjiyon y visitaron la sede del Festival de Esculturas de Hielo.

articles.title: Otorgada orden coreana al embajador laosiano
articles.content:
Otorgada orden coreana al embajador laosiano
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- La Orden de Amistad de la RPDC de segunda clase fue otorgada al embajador lao en Corea, Kiettisak Keobanhdith.
					El apoyo y se solidarizo con la justa causa del pueblo coreano y contribuyo al desarrollo de las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y Laos.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de otorgamiento de la orden.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, y los funcionarios interesados, asi como los miembros de la embajada laosiana.

articles.title: Iniciada en Corea plantacion de arboles
articles.content:
Iniciada en Corea plantacion de arboles
Pyongyang, 3 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedo iniciada en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la plantacion de arboles con motivo del Dia de Reforestacion (2 de marzo), en que el Presidente Kim Il Sung encendio la primera antorcha de la campana de plantacion de arboles.
					Los funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes se movilizaron a esa campana, tras participar en los actos de juramento.
					
					A los actos asistieron Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Phyong Hae y otros funcionarios,  asi como el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones del Partido y el Poder y entidades de masas de esta capital.
					
					Los oradores recordaron que el Presidente Kim Il Sung subio el 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche a la colina Moran para encender la primera antorcha de la campana de plantacion de arboles.
					
					Senalaron que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il se empeno para la reforestacion y la creacion de areas verdes de todo el pais, en medio de sus trabajos muy ocupados para dirigir la revolucion de Songun.
					
					Subrayaron que el grandioso proyecto de los Generalisimos de reverdecer todos los montes de la patria, se lleva a la realidad gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, otro patriotico sin igual.
					
					Llamaron a todos a levantarse como un solo hombre en el esfuerzo por acondicionar la patria como paraiso socialista.
					
					Los participantes sembraron muchos arboles en el Lugar de interes historico-revolucionario de Mangyongdae, la colina Moran, el monte Ryong-ak y alrededores de la Almaciga Central del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental.
					
					Los funcionarios del Comite de Construccion Capitalina, el Ministerio del Ferrocarril, el Ministerio de Cultura, el Ministerio de Urbanismo, la Direccion General del Recreo, plantaron los arboles en la arboleda del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, la villa deportiva en el islote Yanggak, los Estudios Cinematograficos de Corea, el aeropuerto internacional de Pyongyang y otros lugares.
					
					Los funcionarios del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang, el Comite Popular de la ciudad, los organos del Partido y el Poder y entidades de masas de esta capital, plantaron muchos frutales y arboles de mas de 20 generos en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon del capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					Los trabajadores de todas las provincias organizaron los actos de juramento y plantaron arboles de buena variedad.
					
					Solo en el Dia de Reforestacion, fueron plantados a escala nacional mas de 4 millones 800 mil arboles y arbustos floriferos.
